      • empiricalLikelihood

        public double empiricalLikelihood(int numSamples,
                         InstanceList testing)
        For use with empirical likelihood evaluate: sample a path through the tree, then sample a multinomial over topics in that path, then return a weighted sum of words.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method is primarily for testing purposes. The HierarchicalLDATUI class has a more flexible interface for command-line use.
